data.title: About: Carlos Alazraki
data.meta_description: Carlos Alazraki Grossmann (born October 8, 1947 in Mexico City) is a Mexican advertising executive. Alazraki is the founder, president, and CEO of Alazraki & Asociados Publicidad agency and the previous president of the Asociación Mexicana de Agencias de Publicidad (AMAP, Mexican Association of Advertising Agencies). He is the son of film director Benito Alazraki and son-in-law of the late Samy Yeroham, owner of Topeka. He is also the father of director Gary Alazraki.
data.text:
dbo:abstract

Carlos Alazraki Grossmann (born October 8, 1947 in Mexico City) is a Mexican advertising executive. Alazraki is the founder, president, and CEO of Alazraki & Asociados Publicidad agency and the previous president of the Asociación Mexicana de Agencias de Publicidad (AMAP, Mexican Association of Advertising Agencies). He is the son of film director Benito Alazraki and son-in-law of the late Samy Yeroham, owner of Topeka. He is also the father of director Gary Alazraki. (en)
